description: Nationalist and pro-secessions groups clashed in Kharkiv, a major city in eastern Ukraine.
title: Tensions Flare Over Loyalty to Russia in Eastern Ukraine
title_page: Tensions Flare Over Loyalty to Russia in Eastern Ukraine - The New York Times
text: The location of a clash between pro-Moscow and nationalist groups in an apartment near the center of Kharkiv. The police say two people died after members of ultranationalist Ukrainian groups were surrounded in an apartment they shared.
